setting.name: King County
setting.description: A rural, darker, and grittier place with a persistent layer of gloom and neglect. Surfaces are dusty, and the air carries a slight haze, hinting at the moral decay underlying the community. Locations like LeGrand Station shine unnaturally bright, creating discomfort.

mystery.title: The Disappearance of Clara McKenzie
mystery.background: Clara McKenzie, a waitress, vanished under mysterious circumstances about two years ago. Known for her friendly demeanor, she began speaking of strange occurrences before her disappearance.
audio_tape_content: Clara expresses fears about being watched and mentions whispers regarding a sacrifice and a ritual in the woods.
Danny urges her to keep quiet, indicating potential danger in revealing what she knows.
